== execve ==
`int execve(const char *path, char *const argv[], char *const envp[]);`

`path` should contain path and executable file name.

{{{
execve("/bin/ls", pointer to {"ls", "-l", NULL}, NULL);
}}}

=== execvp ===
search executable under `PATH` env var
